breadcrumbs.title: Register a vehicle for LEZ and ULEZ

texts: Includes vans (over 1.205 tonnes unladen weight but not exceeding 3.5 tonnes gross vehicle weight) or minibuses (not over 5 tonnes gross vehicle weight). Also included are motor caravans, motorised horse boxes, breakdown and recovery vehicles, private ambulances, motor hearses, dual-purpose vehicles and other specialist types fitting the weight criteria.

Includes HGVs (over 3.5 tonnes gross vehicle weight) or buses and coaches (over 5 tonnes gross vehicle weight). Also included are breakdown and recovery vehicles, refuse collection vehicles, road sweepers and any other specialist equipment built onto a heavy commercial chassis fitting the weight criteria.
Includes cars, motorcycles and small vans (under 1.205 tonnes unladen weight and not exceeding 3.5 tonnes gross vehicle weight).
Includes non-road going vehicles, military vehicles, agricultural vehicles and mobile cranes.
